languages.text: Варп-течения перепутаны, беженцы сбиваются с пути и гибнут. Вольный Торговец отправит набожные дозоры для помощи терпящим бедствие и зажигания варп-маяков.
With the warp currents tangled, refugees lose their way and perish in terror. The Rogue Trader can send out pious patrols to help those in distress and light warp beacons.
languages.original_text: Варп-течения перепутаны, беженцы сбиваются с пути и гибнут. Вольный Торговец отправит набожные дозоры для помощи терпящим бедствие и зажигания варп-маяков.

traits.locale_text: With the warp currents tangled, refugees lose their way and perish in horror. The Rogue Trader can send out pious patrols to help those in distress and light warp beacons.
The traitorous warp currents can be made safer by sending pious patrols to help those in distress and by the lighting of warp beacons.
With the warp currents tangled, refugees lose their way and perish in terror. The Rogue Trader can send out pious patrols to help those in distress and light warp beacons.
The traitorous warp currents can be made safer by sending pious patrols to help those in distress and by the lighting of warp beacons.
With the warp currents tangled, refugees lose their way and perish in horror. The Rogue Trader can send out pious patrols to help those in distress and light warp beacons.
With the warp currents tangled, refugees lose their way and perish in terror. The Rogue Trader can send out pious patrols to help those in distress and light warp beacons.
With the warp currents tangled, refugees lose their way and perish in terror. The Rogue Trader can send out pious patrols to help those in distress and light warp beacons.

languages.text: Depuis que les courants du Warp sont perturbés, les réfugiés perdent leur chemin et périssent dans la terreur. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} peut envoyer des patrouilles pieuses aider les vaisseaux en détresse et allumer des balises.
languages.original_text: With the warp currents tangled, refugees lose their way and perish in terror. The Rogue Trader can send out pious patrols to help those in distress and light warp beacons.

traits.locale_text: Depuis que les courants du Warp sont perturbés, les réfugiés perdent leur chemin et périssent dans la terreur. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} peut envoyer des patrouilles pieuses aider les vaisseaux en détresse et allumer des balises.

languages.text: ワープ海流がもつれ、難民は迷い、恐怖の中で滅びた。ローグトレーダーは、遭難者を助けるために敬虔なパトロール隊を派遣し、<歪み>のビーコンを点灯させることができる。
languages.original_text: With the warp currents tangled, refugees lose their way and perish in terror. The Rogue Trader can send out pious patrols to help those in distress and light warp beacons.

traits.locale_text: ワープ海流がもつれ、難民は迷い、恐怖の中で滅びた。ローグトレーダーは、遭難者を助けるために敬虔なパトロール隊を派遣し、<歪み>のビーコンを点灯させることができる。

languages.text: 由于亚空间发生湍流，许多难民在航行中迷失了方向，在恐惧中一命呜呼。行商浪人可以派遣虔诚的巡逻队帮助遇险的船只，点亮亚空间的信标。
languages.original_text: With the warp currents tangled, refugees lose their way and perish in terror. The Rogue Trader can send out pious patrols to help those in distress and light warp beacons.

traits.locale_text: 由于亚空间发生湍流，许多难民在航行中迷失了方向，在恐惧中一命呜呼。行商浪人可以派遣虔诚的巡逻队帮助遇险的船只，点亮亚空间的信标。

languages.text: Con las corrientes de la disformidad enmarañadas, los refugiados se pierden y mueren aterrados. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente podría enviar patrullas piadosas a ayudar a los necesitados y encender balizas en la disformidad.
languages.original_text: With the warp currents tangled, refugees lose their way and perish in terror. The Rogue Trader can send out pious patrols to help those in distress and light warp beacons.

traits.locale_text: Con las corrientes de la disformidad enmarañadas, los refugiados se pierden y mueren aterrados. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente podría enviar patrullas piadosas a ayudar a los necesitados y encender balizas en la disformidad.

languages.text: Durch die verwickelten Warpströme verlieren die Flüchtlinge die Orientierung und sterben qualvoll und völlig verängstigt. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} kann fromme Patrouillen ausschicken, um allen in Not zu helfen und Leuchtsignale im Warp zu entzünden.
languages.original_text: With the warp currents tangled, refugees lose their way and perish in terror. The Rogue Trader can send out pious patrols to help those in distress and light warp beacons.

traits.locale_text: Durch die verwickelten Warpströme verlieren die Flüchtlinge die Orientierung und sterben qualvoll und völlig verängstigt. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} kann fromme Patrouillen ausschicken, um allen in Not zu helfen und Leuchtsignale im Warp zu entzünden.

languages.text: Öte akıntılarının birbirine dolaşmasıyla yolunu kaybeden mülteciler, korku içinde can veriyor. Hür Tacir, bu kişilere yardım edip öteboyut parıldaklarını yakmaları için dini bütün devriyelerini gönderebilir.
languages.original_text: With the warp currents tangled, refugees lose their way and perish in terror. The Rogue Trader can send out pious patrols to help those in distress and light warp beacons.
